title: 222- Combat Hearing Loss
description: The US military buys a lot of foam ear plugs. Visit any base and you’ll find them under the bleachers at the firing range, in the bottoms of washing machines. They are cheap and effective at making noise less … noisy. … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
